title: OpenWeather Geocoding API Input
description: Search for geographic coordinates (lat/lon) of cities, states, and countries using OpenWeather Geocoding API.
Essential first step before calling current weather or forecast APIs when you only have city names or addresses.
Converts location names like 'San Francisco, CA' or 'London, UK' into precise coordinates for accurate weather data.
Supports direct geocoding (name â†’ coordinates) with multiple results and optional result limiting.
Perfect for location lookup, address validation, and preparing coordinates for other OpenWeather API calls.

q.description: City name, state code (only for the US) and country code divided by comma. Please use ISO 3166 country codes.

limit.description: Number of the locations in the API response (up to 5 results can be returned)
